body.p: Born in Wood County, Virginia in 1809. Opened a law practice in Convington, Kenton County, Kentucky. Foley became the Mayor of Covington, Kentucky in 1845 and served until 1860. His slaves escaped to Canada from his home in Covington, Kentucky in 1853. Foley died on March 16, 1867 in Covington, Kentuky.
